DOC.brief_summary: Maintaining healthy body weight major challenge majority Canadians . A lifestyle strategy promotes maintenance healthy body weight , perhaps importantly , incorporate daily life relative ease essential . This study determine effective strategy include increased physical activity conjunction high intake dairy product immediately follow exercise . Fifty-six overweight adult male regularly exercise assign one four group 12 week . All group preform 12 week exercise training ( 1 hour cycling per day , 5 time per week ) . Two group consume supplemental low fat milk ( 3 serving per day ) one group consume immediately exercise consume either well long exercise session . The two group consume carbohydrate drink amount energy low fat milk , one group consume drink right exercise another group consume either well long exercise session . Markers health status include body weight , muscle mass , bone mass measure start 12- week intervention . The investigator anticipate provide low fat milk immediately exercise result favorable change health outcome , provide realistic lifestyle intervention overweight individual attain healthy body weight , , optimize ability prevent chronic disease .
